rooms.description: Large entrance with natural light and an open layout leading to living areas.

Open Scandinavian style living room with comfortable seating and ample storage, emphasizing minimalistic design and functionality. Vastu principles are adhered by placing the main entrance in the north-east direction.
Dining area adjacent to the kitchen; designed for social gatherings with modern Scandinavian finishes.
Dedicated home office space located in a quiet corner of the living area, ensuring minimal distractions and good natural light.
Open-plan kitchen with Scandinavian aesthetics, efficient layout, and Vastu-aligned orientation for optimal energy flow.
Central courtyard featuring greenery, outdoor seating, and adequate sunlight; serves as the heart of the cottage, promoting natural ventilation and relaxation in accordance with Vastu principles.

openings.description: Main entrance door located at the north-east corner, ensuring proper flow of positive energy according to Vastu guidelines.
Multiple windows installed for ample natural lighting and ventilation in every room. The placement is optimized based on Vastu and Scandinavian design principles.
